h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: Once you've finally caught onto his tricks and taken him down, he'll flee the scene, declaring that he's "done as our brother asked".
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once you've finally caught onto his tricks and taken him down, he'll flee the scene, declaring that he's "done as our brother asked".
